column2: ain last departure airports and airlines to Sri Lanka

column1: An  analysis  of  the  last  departure  airports  to  Sri  Lanka  reveals  the  vital  importance  of  air
connectivity  in  the  tourism  industry.  As  depicted  in  the  below  Chart  5,  for  around  49%  of
tourists the last airports had been Doha, Dubai and  Chennai. Further, in terms of airlines, Sri
Lankan Airlines, Qatar Airways  and Emirates were the top airlines, handling 72% of tourists
